item.title: R: rank2score
item.description: Converting a ranking into a set of normally distributed scores. rank2score <- function(rank, n_total, mn = 0, std = 1, n_tied = 1) { # following the equal area method # http://node101.psych.cornell.edu/Darlington/transfrm.htm mean_rank <- rank / n_tied qnorm(mean_rank / (n_total + 1), mean = mn, sd = std) }
